Subject: Neo Beast Wars
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

::Bazooka::

    Having liked the feeling of mindless destruction he left the Predacon 
base and went about in Beast mode. He slammed his club tail into anything he 
felt like trees, rocks, small animals. "Where are Maximals when you need 
them?" He asked himself.
    Hours became seconds for him. Eventually his internal clocks said he 
needed to eat. He climbed down into a valley and ate to his Spark's content. 
He found a little cave with water in it and entered. Within he found a stasis 
pod opened. He transformed into robot mode and looked at the computer screen.
    On the screen was DNA from an Anklosaurus. Looking around he saw the 
skull of the dinosaur sticking out from a rock. This was his stasis pod. 
Looking around in shear terror at the remains of his "species". He ran out 
into the open again and fell down a cliff.
